HotelElement.Name: East On Byron Resort Byron Bay

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at East on Byron in Byron Bay, you'll be on the beach and close to Wategos Beach and Cape Byron Lighthouse. This 4.5-star apartment is within close proximity of Tyagarah Nature Reserve and Byron Bay Golf Course.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 26 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and microwaves. Rooms have private furnished balconies. LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and a spa tub. This apartment also features tour/ticket assistance and barbecue grills.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), laundry facilities, and a library. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Wategos Beach - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Cape Byron Lighthouse - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Tyagarah Nature Reserve - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Byron Bay Golf Course - 4.6 km / 2.9 mi
Tallow Beach - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Kings Beach - 7.5 km / 4.6 mi
Lake Ainsworth Sport and Recreation Centre - 16.3 km / 10.1 mi
Lennox Head Surf Life Saving Club - 16.7 km / 10.4 mi
Ballina Jockey Club - 24.3 km / 15.1 mi
Ballina Golf Club - 24.4 km / 15.1 mi
Ballina Fair Shopping Centre - 25.2 km / 15.6 mi
Shelly Beach - 25.4 km / 15.8 mi
Lighthouse Beach - 26.1 km / 16.2 mi
Ballina Naval and Maritime Museum - 26.7 km / 16.6 mi

The preferred airport for East on Byron is Ballina, NSW (BNK-Ballina - Byron Gateway) - 22.9 km / 14.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
